NotFoundView.title: Page not found
NotFoundView.text: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.
NotFoundView.goBack: Go back to the previous page

Error.usernameMin: Username must be larger than 3 characters
Error.usernameMax: Username can be no larger than 32 characters
Error.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
Error.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least one number, one upperletter and one lowercase letter

ImageUpload.errorBadType: File type must be one of: %{types}.
ImageUpload.errorTooLarge: The image is too large. File size must be less than %{size} MB.
